benchmark_details.name: Creativity Benchmark
benchmark_details.overview: Creativity Benchmark is a domain-grounded evaluation for marketing tasks, measuring marketing-related creativity of large language models across 100 brands in 12 categories and three prompt types.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the creative performance of large language models in a marketing context using expert human evaluation.

data.source: Evaluations conducted by industry professionals in marketing and advertising using an online platform.
data.annotation: Human judgments on model outputs based on creativity criteria.

methodology.calculation: Using Bradley-Terry models to analyze pairwise human preferences.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better model performance in generating preferred creative outputs.
methodology.baseline_results: Multiple models evaluated with no clear winner across all tasks indicated by closely clustered win rates.

targeted_risks.demographic_analysis: Analysis of gender and age demographics of evaluators included.
